entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 11:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.8°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -34.0°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
